TextLibrary.Text: As you are making your way through the Hammer Pass, a band of Ogres leap out at you!
Khalkus is impressed with the way you saved the Caravan. He joins you as a Companion.
You will need to defeat these Ogres before you can progress any further.
Dugog is too strong - you cannot get past him. You must try again.
Dugog is dead, and the way into Dhun-Kor is clear. You take all of his treasure, including a huge Club that looks obviously magical.
You must travel to the Hammer Pass and meet with Khalkus.
You must travel to Theira and help the Caravan safely through.
You must travel to Dhun-Kor and defeat Dugog, the two-headed Ogre.
The Ogres have been defeated and you may travel down into the lands of Kor.
Dugog, the giant two-headed Ogre, stands at the gates of Dhun-Kor, blocking your way.
The Wight has captured the Caravan. You must fight him again to capture it back.
This Wight is better equipped and armored than most.
This Ogre is wearing Chainmail armor for better protection.
Dugog, the two-headed Ogre, is the leader of the forces that have been attacking Agaria. Beware the second head!
